game.name: Motor Town: Behind The Wheel
game.genres: Adventure, Casual, Indie, Racing, Simulation, Early Access
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Co-op, Online Co-op, Partial Controller Support, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 레이서즈 클럽에서 만든 오픈 월드 드라이빙 시뮬레이션! 느긋하게 화물을 운반하거나, 버스나 택시를 몰아서 번 돈으로 멋진 차와 파츠를 구매한 뒤 레이스 트랙에서 실력을 발휘하세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Enjoy realistic driving in the open world. Relaxing cargo deliveries or driving buses and taxis will give you enough money to buy new cars and parts. You can test your driving skills at the race track. It's all about pure driving pleasure!

reviewHighlights.text: Consider this game... If you like any sort of car based game - or have played one at some point in time. (ATS, NFS, GTA) & If you have played an MMORP...
This is the game I wish I grew up with. Me and my brother would have had so much fun building our business and just driving, driving. This game is mad...
